verses.verse: Now after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> it came to pass, that the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, Moses'<WH4872> minister<WH8334>, saying<WH559>,

Moses<WH4872> my servant<WH5650> is dead<WH4191>; now therefore arise<WH6965>, go over<WH5674> this Jordan<WH3383>, thou, and all this people<WH5971>, unto the land<WH776> which I do give<WH5414> to them, even to the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
Every place<WH4725> that the sole<WH3709> of your foot<WH7272> shall tread upon<WH1869>, that have I given<WH5414> unto you, as I said<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>.

From the wilderness<WH4057> and this Lebanon<WH3844> even unto the great<WH1419> river<WH5104>, the river<WH5104> Euphrates<WH6578>, all the land<WH776> of the Hittites<WH2850>, and unto the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> toward the going down<WH3996> of the sun<WH8121>, shall be your coast<WH1366>.

There shall not any man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> thee all the days<WH3117> of thy life<WH2416>: as I was with Moses<WH4872>, so I will be with thee: I will not fail<WH7503> thee, nor forsake<WH5800> thee.

Be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage<WH553>: for unto this people<WH5971> shalt thou divide for an inheritance<WH5157> the land<WH776>, which I sware<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> them. unto this: or, thou shalt cause this people to inherit the land, etc

Only be thou strong<WH2388> and very<WH3966> courageous<WH553>, that thou mayest observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all the law<WH8451>, which Moses<WH4872> my servant<WH5650> commanded<WH6680> thee: turn<WH5493> not from it to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left<WH8040>, that thou mayest prosper<WH7919> whithersoever thou goest<WH3212>. prosper: or, do wisely

This book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> shall not depart<WH4185> out of thy mouth<WH6310>; but thou shalt meditate<WH1897> therein day<WH3119> and night<WH3915>, that thou mayest observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> according to all that is written<WH3789> therein: for then thou shalt make<WH6743> thy way<WH1870> prosperous<WH6743>, and then thou shalt have good success<WH7919>. have: or, do wisely

Have not I commanded<WH6680> thee? Be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage<WH553>; be not afraid<WH6206>, neither be thou dismayed<WH2865>: for the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> is with thee whithersoever thou goest<WH3212>.
Then Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680> the officers<WH7860> of the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>,

Pass<WH5674> through<WH7130> the host<WH4264>, and command<WH6680> the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Prepare<WH3559> you victuals<WH6720>; for within three<WH7969> days<WH3117> ye shall pass over<WH5674> this Jordan<WH3383>, to go in<WH935> to possess<WH3423> the land<WH776>, which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> you to possess<WH3423> it.
And to the Reubenites<WH7206>, and to the Gadites<WH1425>, and to half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519>, spake<WH559> Joshua<WH3091>, saying<WH559>,

Remember<WH2142> the word<WH1697> which Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> you, saying<WH559>, The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given you rest<WH5117>, and hath given<WH5414> you this land<WH776>.

Your wives<WH802>, your little ones<WH2945>, and your cattle<WH4735>, shall remain<WH3427> in the land<WH776> which Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> you on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383>; but ye shall pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> your brethren<WH251> armed<WH2571>, all the mighty<WH1368> men of valour<WH2428>, and help<WH5826> them; armed: Heb. marshalled by five

Until the LORD<WH3068> have given<WH5117> your brethren<WH251> rest<WH5117>, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed<WH3423> the land<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> them: then ye shall return<WH7725> unto the land<WH776> of your possession<WH3425>, and enjoy<WH3423> it, which Moses<WH4872> the LORD'S<WH3068> servant<WH5650> gave<WH5414> you on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrising<WH4217> <WH8121>.
And they answered<WH6030> Joshua<WH3091>, saying<WH559>, All that thou commandest<WH6680> us we will do<WH6213>, and whithersoever<WH834> thou sendest<WH7971> us, we will go<WH3212>.
According as we hearkened<WH8085> unto Moses<WH4872> in all things, so will we hearken<WH8085> unto thee: only the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> be with thee, as he was with Moses<WH4872>.

Whosoever<WH376> he be that doth rebel<WH4784> against thy commandment<WH6310>, and will not hearken<WH8085> unto thy words<WH1697> in all that thou commandest<WH6680> him, he shall be put to death<WH4191>: only be strong<WH2388> and of a good courage<WH553>.
